item.description:
Rain is forcasted for Saturday. I dont want to risk driving 1 hr and 45 minutes to spend the day in the rain.

Now the meetup is for HARVEST FEST in Somerville.

Harvest Fest 2009, A Celebration of Local Business, Food, Libations, Music and Art

See the info below. Please purchase your tickets before the event!

Presented by Somerville Local First, downTown Wines & Spirits, Somerville Scout and The Center for Arts at the Armory

On Saturday, October 3 from 1-8PM, Harvest Fest will bring together some of the finest artistic, culinary and musical talents from in and around the city of Somerville. Samples and demonstrations from local microbreweries will be presented throughout the day.

Admission: FREE
Food & drink wristband: $12 (unlimited food and drink)

Tickets available on-line through Brown Paper Tickets
OR purchase at downTown Wines & Spirits, 225 Elm Street, Somerville, MA 02144
Doors open at 1pm- please arrive promptly to avoid entrance delay

FASHION SHOW featuring Artifaktori, Suneri, Black & Blues and poor little rich girl.

MUSIC/MULTIMEDIA performances by One Fine Morning, Hugh McGowan, and Zebbler Encanti Experience

VENDORS will include:

downTown Wines & Spirits
Redbones
Blue Cloud Gallery
Magpie
Eat at Jumbo's
Teele Square Caf√©
Highland Kitchen
The Independent
Make the Shift
Berkshire Brewing Company
Blue Hills Brewery
Geary's
Haverhill Brewing Company
Longtail
Magic Hat
Mayflower
Peak Organic
Shipyard
Greenvale Vineyards
Running Brook Vineyards
Turtle Creek Winery
and many more!

We can meet just inside the entry.
my cell is 617 406 9696
item.name: NOW: HARVEST FEST (Garlic and Arts Festival- CANCELED)
